raw_text:
(b) Influencer-Led Video Campaigns
• Collaborate with top influencers in the spiritual, cultural and motivational domains (having minimum 1 million+ subscribers/followers and strong engagement) to create and publish 10 videos (12–15 minutes each) on their YouTube and social media channels within a 3-month period.
• The videos should be hosted by the influencer (speaking on-camera) about Maharaj Ji’s philosophy, DJJS’s social/spiritual contributions and Brahm Gyan.
• Further, these videos to be published on the influencer’s YouTube/social media channels and cross-posted on DJJS official social platforms
• Please share List of 15 proposed influencers (with metrics: subscriber/follower count, typical views, engagement rates, geographic reach), with their fees/packages for collaboration.

campaign_objectives.influencer_criteria: Top influencers in spiritual, cultural, and motivational domains with minimum 1 million+ subscribers/followers and strong engagement

campaign_objectives.distribution_strategy: Published on influencer’s channels and cross-posted on DJJS official social platforms

campaign_objectives.action_item: Provide a list of 15 proposed influencers with specific metrics and fees/packages
